title: I'm nervous for the next win rate update
body:
on lolking and sites like those

If MF has a disgusting win rate from this last buff along with the future "buffs"/changes she's getting, what will the future hold for my queen...? 

I remember what happened to Cass (she and MF are my two favorites). She got her spotlight, now look at her, lmao. I hope this doesn't happen with {{champion:21}} . 

I'll be praying to Britney Spears and hoping for the best.

replies.body:
i don't think it'll happen, besides maybe another slight tone down on her ult scaling if it actually proves too strong 

as uninteresting as other parts of her kit is, MF's ult is very high-counterplay unless her teammates go for a wombo. Even then you can pick champions who are well-equipped to deal with them and her
